resources.string: The passphrase is important for sharing the control of your WebCar. With the passphrase you may allways panic shut-down the connection, so you have the control every time.
Plug in the phone connector from your WebCar

To plug in your phone connector is important for control your car. The audio signals will be translated to the speed/directions/etc. The app will turn on your system volume when the phone connector is plugged in.
Your WebCar is now ready to roll. On the controller device navigate to
For releasing your WebCar you need to establish a Wifi-Connection
The Wifi-connection is important because the communication between the released and the controller device.
Do NOT disconnect one of the devices during driving. The WebCar will stop immediately.
Important Note: Both devices have to be in the same Wifi-Network.

Das Projekt WebCar wurde von
 • Lederer Maria Lisa
 • Poschacher Michael
 • Slamanig Sebastian
 im Rahmen des Studiums an der Fachhochschule Puch Urstein (Salzburg) im Bereich "Multimedia Technology - Web and Communities" erstellt.

 BetreuerInnen:
 • DI Brigitte Jellinek (Fachsbereichsleiterin 	MMT - Web and Communities)
 • Michael Cramer (Mobile Applications)
 • Achim Stremplat (Mobile Applications)
